segments.text: Good evening . Welcome to our restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good evening . We want a dinning room with a table for eight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . The rooms are not available now . But would you like to have your dinner in the dinning hall ? I can find a table by the window for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . We have made a reservation before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll ask waitress to show you the way .
segments.speaker: S1
